div.h4: The best School in the country with first class services

div.h3: Modern technologies demand the highest level of education

div.p: A state of the art learning environment with well equipped classrooms, labs and training rooms to enhance better learning capabilities.
For the first time in sierra leone secondary school education parents and school staff can access students records from anywhere around the globe.
Our school provide well trained and equipped staff to carry out our educational and administrative processes with the highest professional standards.
Here you will find opportunities to excel in a rich academic environment that fosters the development and advancement of our students.
You can now request an admission directly from your computer with comfort.
Competitive fees that can be afforded and worth paying.
We are known for our outstanding performance in public exams like NPSE, BECE and WASSCE etc.

div.h3: IT IS POSSIBLE TO GET KNOW ABOUT YOUR STUDENT WHILE STAYING AT HOME
div.p: Easily access the online portal and login with your parental account

div.h4: Past Students Make a Mark at University
div.p: Eleven of our past students graduated with division one at the Fourah Bay College University of Sierra Leone.

div.h4: Social media is method for socialization
div.p: Students are the majority users of social networking sites like Facebook and Twitter. These are the right places to introduce brands to young people.It is probably the right place to introduce a brand to them. To capture the student audience, it is essential to be a part of the conversation.

Our Schol's new student orientation program for new students is a wonderful opportunity for students to flourish academically, grow personally, and engage socially, to be the first on your way to success. We are here to help you succeed in your transition.
